snippet: More than six inches of rain fell in just two hours on Saturday night in Ellicott City, Md., sending a fast-moving current down its Main Street....
abstract: Floods in historic town of Ellicott City in Maryland leave two people dead after six inches of rain fall in two hours.
lead_paragraph: More than six inches of rain fell in just two hours on Saturday night in Ellicott City, Md., sending a fast-moving current down its Main Street.

headline.main: Flood Rips Through Historic Maryland Town, Killing at Least 2
headline.print_headline: Flood Rips Through Historic Maryland Town, Leaving at Least 2 Dead
